argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmapfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmapfval.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pmapfval.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | pmapfval.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_pmapval | |- ( ( K e. C /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) = { x e. A | x .<_ X } ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( K e. C /\ X e. B ) -> ( P e. ( M ` X ) <-> P e. { x e. A | x .<_ X } ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( x = P -> ( x .<_ X <-> P .<_ X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_elrab | |- ( P e. { x e. A | x .<_ X } <-> ( P e. A /\ P .<_ X ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( K e. C /\ X e. B ) -> ( P e. ( M ` X ) <-> ( P e. A /\ P .<_ X ) ) ) |
